name: OtakuGeneration

skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: otaku generation
des: OtakuGeneration is a weekly podcast . We discuss various topics that interest the anime fan. The reason the show is called "Otaku Generation", is because we talk about topics that interest "a generation of fans". If it involves the internet, animation, gaming, comics, movies, sci-fi, anime and manga we'll talk about it or talk to someone deemed/considered knowledgeable in the topic..
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
